website_summaries.verdict: Most buyers found this to be an extremely durable suit with minimal shedding.
pros: Suit is water-repellent, flame-retardant, and mildew proof
Comes with a hood, jacket, pants, gun cover, and carry case
cons: Some buyers report quality issues with material ripping and buttons that easily pop off
The suit also has a bit of an odor to it, which can be an issue if you take it hunting

customer_reviews.title: Great ghillie!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that is easy on/easy off, and this was it. I also wanted something that doesn't snag on every branch, and it seems to be great for that. It is very lightweight, very breathable, and goes over any clothing you want to wear. Does not add to overall warmth (You don't get hot). It's a simple concept to concealment. I will look for something similar in a snow/winter pattern for hunting in the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Kalin Ayhan

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously?! These things are amazing for the price. Fit well over clothes and boots, very breatheable, and wow do they work amazing. Try to find me in the photograph.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip A Kelley

customer_reviews.title: its no rip off👍
customer_reviews.text: I bought two 30 year old males these after their nephew recieved one at Christmas.these guys always asked for one but suits were to expensive.When I seen this price I read up on description to see why so cheap but couldnt find a problem, cause there wasnt any! They counted down days for arrivel and told tales of how they were gonna use them(facebook comedy).They used them hunting too. Very happy with pants ,top,face hoody & bag to stash it away in the closet.2 👍👍thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: doya wanna know

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic deal
customer_reviews.text: Im 6’ 230lbs, with a 47” chest and 36” waist and this fits very comfortably. I cut the elastic band out of the bottom of the jacket to make it more comfortable and so it doesnt ride up over my pants. What you get for the money is a very functional 3D camouflage that breaks up the human silhouette nicely. I bought this for hunting and wanted something i could throw over my regular clothes. It’s lightweight and breathable. Not sure about the durability yet. Probably just want to hand wash it and be careful not to snag it on briars, sticks or branches.
customer_reviews.author: BlueFalcon

customer_reviews.title: Disappear in the woods.
customer_reviews.text: Made me invisible and fit over my winter clothes. I'm 6'3", 210# so that pretty big.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Good for some
customer_reviews.text: This a a cheap suit that works pretty well. Fits over any regular clothes and has helped me avoid buying expensive camo so I can wear my regular winter clothes and save money. My only complaint is that the new version (I end up replacing this every 2 seasons and have bought before), is that the newest batch appears to have a flaw in the dye and there is a slight white tiny to the main fabric. Not sure if deer can see it, I’m sure a turkey might. But I use this for hunting and had 2/3 year old deer stand 15’ from me without being busted.
customer_reviews.author: Rex9802

customer_reviews.title: They do fit heavier set people with plenty of wiggle room
customer_reviews.text: I'm really surprised how much I like this set I didn't figure I would get much from the cost but I love the jacket and how it has the zipper and anyone who is worried about the size you need not worry I'm a pretty large person and I wore it over a thermal under shirt and another long sleeve shirt and it fits fine the bottoms are a little more snug but still nothing to worry about five stars for the price I'm going to order another set to make sure I have a fresh set come spring turkey season
customer_reviews.author: Tannycoarkites

customer_reviews.title: Invisibility cloak! Breathes well!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a cloak for an elven ranger costume. For everyone that cosplay, wearing layers and layers for accuracy is a burden we all do, despite how awesome we look, often we forget how much we are wearing and overheat. Not only does it breathe well, it's also super light and offers exceptional mobility! And like a true woodman I was able to blend in with my surroundings as a bonus! My only side note is that despite it being one size, the front covers more as compared to the back.
customer_reviews.author: Aries S.

customer_reviews.title: Decent material and craftsmanship, but colors are too strong.
customer_reviews.text: I give this 3 stars because the colors are a bit intense. The greens are like a spring green where it's super vibrant and vivid. This would be fine, but the browns are like a vivid autumn oak color. The colors are fine by themselves, but the colors together are like mixing spring and autumn. You can't have a super vibrant green in the autumn and you can't have a really rich orange/brown in the spring.
customer_reviews.author: Dre Freden

customer_reviews.title: but the damaged item was a disappointment. My son wore it on Halloween and enjoyed ...
customer_reviews.text: I ended up purchasing this for my son for a Halloween Costume. Amazon had messed up and could not fulfill my original order on time even though I paid an additional charge for S/H. So, we ordered this Ghillie Suit in a rush and I paid more then I wanted. The suit was all right, but came with missing snaps on one of the pant legs. It did come on time which was a huge plus, but the damaged item was a disappointment. My son wore it on Halloween and enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant for the price but well done. It does need some airing out after recieved. Awesome item. Purchased for my husband for Xmas. One size fits all and it fit my 5'11 - 180lbs husband just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Isabela Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cheap
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. It was falling apart out of the box. Threads coming out etc. It’s cheap, sure, but even still I don’t think you’ll get your money out of it. It’s also shiny which is odd? Returning for something more expensive, but will hopefully be better off in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Corey M.

customer_reviews.title: I like the baggy ness though because it lets me fit ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6’1, 32/34 for pants, and a men’s large for shirts. I bought the type 1 version and it fit well although a bit baggy... I like the baggy ness though because it lets me fit a layer or two or protection when playing airsoft with friends
customer_reviews.author: Samuel A.

customer_reviews.title: Good to wear once.
customer_reviews.text: If you're only going to wear this once, it should work. However the durability is not there. On the second time wearing mine, the zipper began to fail and the threads began to separate causing it to fray and gradually unravel. If you need camo for any serious purpose, such as hunting, this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Sanner

customer_reviews.title: Field-tested and mother-approved
customer_reviews.text: I used this suit to blend in with the outdoors and spook my mom. She walked right past me WITHOUT NOTICING ME AT ALL! She walked by me again and I sprung up to startle her. The look on her face was so worth it. 10/10 would recommend to hunters, nature photographers, airsoft players, pranksters and Bigfoot chasers.
customer_reviews.author: Random Reviewer #349876200

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband for Christmas. I haven’t gave it to him yet but he is a size large shirt and 34,34 jeans and I believe it will fit him just fine. This outfit is made to wear over top of other clothes. It is a mesh like material and is very thin. It could not be worn alone as it’s transparent. Overall good quality for The price.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, comfortable, affordable, effective, stylish
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this for paintball. It's super lightweight and cool enough to wear shorts and tank top underneath. Ankle elastic is nice and snug. Pants Waistband is good with a drawstring. Jacket Waistband works good. Zipper works good. Has a hood with drawstring. It does shed small pieces but I think that's just at first (not a deal breaker or big deal).
customer_reviews.author: Eric K.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Received product with a broken zipper and returned for a full refund. Nonetheless, the fabric is super thin and probably would not have lasted more than one hunt.
customer_reviews.author: Sean G

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: For the money it’s great. Fits like a jogging suit. I’m 5-10’ 170 pounds and it’s a little baggy which is good because the whole reason for ghillie is to break up the human figure. Lots of leafy cutout and pattern is good as well. For $25 I’m impressed. Also the lose fit allows for under clothing. Very lightweight and breathable. Will be using this for early bow season. Overall I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: nickjbutler501

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is really stout, and it is zippered in the front with a hood. Fast shipping and good quality product. Strongly recommend it. Fit over my size 12 shoes and my clothes. Elastic bands are strong and easily will fit up to an xl. If you have super long arms you will have exposed wrists. I am 5' 10"
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Unfortunately, the fabric snags on everything. A million little strings are constantly falling off. It also attracts all sorts of stickers and prickly things. But it legitimately makes me look like a walking bush. Excellent camo.
customer_reviews.author: Reid S.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is as good as it gets. Worked great, after about my 14-15th use of this, the zipper bent while I was trying to put it on and now it does not work. Didn’t take much. The zipper material is obviously made of some cheap stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hendon

customer_reviews.title: This suit was awesome. My 12 year old is on the bigger ...
customer_reviews.text: This suit was awesome. My 12 year old is on the bigger side so, I had to order him an adult size. It fit great and I love that it had the elastic wrist bands and ankle bands so that is was not drooping over his hands or feet. He wore it for Halloween and no one could even tell he was hiding in their bush until he popped up and said happy Halloween. Great product, well worth the price. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: katie michelle lavely

customer_reviews.title: Recommend and ease fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my nephew as a Christmas present. He requested a Ghillie suit and this was recommended by Amazon. That said he loves it! He is a larger sized teenager, usually wearing a 2x men's shirt and it fit fine. He has worn this out in the woods on his DAds land and has not had any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Maxs Mom

customer_reviews.title: For the money it is a great way to conceal yourself
customer_reviews.text: For the money it is a great way to conceal yourself.........a little face camo cream, gloves and the right footwear and your are ready. The suit is very lightweight so good for warmer weather. I'm 5'10 and 200lbs and I still had plenty of room. The coat has a hood and the pant have elastic band that seems to hold up well. Again, for the money, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: 92Asstchief

customer_reviews.title: You need one of these, trust me
customer_reviews.text: This was a very fun buy! I love to play sniper games and dress up while streaming these games for my community. This is a high quality Forrest ghillie suit which provided me with rich entertainment and days of laughs behind it. Also if a hunter this has a good camouflage to it. I haven't tested it too in to depth but going boar hunting in Texas and not being seen at a blind or feed this is buy you need!
customer_reviews.author: Munchnplay

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for for my teenager to turkey hunt. They slip easily over his clothing. He also uses them to play hide and seek outside with his cousins. Light weight and stretchy.
customer_reviews.author: Daylan

customer_reviews.title: BEST, Decision, EVER!! I love this!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I am so happy with it. As soon as I got it I ran around the office with it on and scared people. I even rode a segway on my stomach with a nerf gun and attacked fellow co-workers. It was the best! I am so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Glen Howards

customer_reviews.title: It's surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked the quality was as good as it was for the price. I put this over jeans and a tshirt then sat in the woods without covering myself in any way and I was hidden very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amm0622

customer_reviews.title: Practical warm weather 3d suit
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this suit is fantastic for hunting. My only issue with it is that is doesn't have pockets which is not the standard with these types of suits anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Light and it breathes!!
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like it. Easy to put on and conceals me well while in a tree stand. Blends in well in my area. Have killed 3 deer with my crossbow so far wearing it. Bill
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Super excited and SO let down. Pay for better quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I recieved my suit in a timely fashion. Did standard delicate wash to remove scent and prepare for opening weekend 2 days away. After the wash finished i found it completely falling apart. Fine little threads just falling off everywhere. 100% disappointed in this product and will NEVER purchase again. My other items and prior leaf suits have NEVER done this. Complete bs.
customer_reviews.author: JDW

customer_reviews.title: wonderful deal but be prepared to use a scent spray ...
customer_reviews.text: wonderful deal but be prepared to use a scent spray in profusion if you are using it to hunt..........terrific buy
customer_reviews.author: tombilly

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but WHATEVER YOU DO ....Do NOT TRY AND WASH IT! IT WILL TEAR IN SHREDS AND THE COMPANY WILL NOT REFUND YOU NOR WILL THEY RESPOND TO YOU.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Spurgeon

customer_reviews.title: it looks like it will work pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Much lower quality than I expected, but it was cheap. You get what you pay for. That said, it looks like it will work pretty well, but I don't expect it to last more than one hunting season.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Great camouflage for covering up regular clothes
customer_reviews.text: One of the best products you’ll get for hunting or anything down with the outdoors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but effective
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Took this to several outdoor airsoft games and it worked well. One thing is the elastic on the pants should be supplemented with suspenders cause they tend to fall down on skinnier ppl like me. No pockets also mean you should def have some tac gear or backpack. Overall it works well for the price and fits snugly
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and durable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the tree stand or turkey hunting. Thorn bushes might do some damage but mine is still holding up well. I’ve had it for three years and throw it over any kind of outdoor clothing I’ll use for the hunt, whether it be heavy jackets and bibs or just a sweater and pants. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S.

customer_reviews.title: husband loves this
customer_reviews.text: just a quick funny story, husband hiding outside wearing this . surprised the heck out of all 3 dogs..lol funny sight
customer_reviews.author: Frankie n Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, breathable, quiet and most important - I am highly camouflaged when using it. Saw it on YouTube and had to get it... Especially for the price. Glad I did. The leaves on it do not rustle so you can move rather stealthily.
customer_reviews.author: John Suchman

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Everything you could ask for in a ghillie suit. Light weight to wear in summer and baggy enough to wear a coat under.
customer_reviews.author: Pavlo Filatov

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, breathable, nice price
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, breathable material, nice price, my son loves this suit and wears it year-round.
customer_reviews.author: D Love

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bow hunting
customer_reviews.text: My son is a hunter he bow hunts, this is where the ghille suit is handy cause you can hide with the leaves the suit looks just like trees
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Deals

customer_reviews.title: Too Much Loose Fibers
customer_reviews.text: Good camo effect, but the saw-toothed fiber pieces keep losing fibers everywhere all the time. The loose fibers stick to clothe, ground, furniture, ... allover the places. It is very cumbersome to clean up these fibers after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Learner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This suit is awesome. Has everything pictured and was packed well
customer_reviews.author: Chip & Vicki Davison

customer_reviews.title: This is a great piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece of kit. Easy to use and I have had no problem getting it back into the bag so long as I turn it inside out first. I am defiently happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Second

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect. I wouldn't throw them in the washing machine ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm six foot but thin. These are perfect. I wouldn't throw them in the washing machine though, Let them sit out in the rain and dry in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Newbie DIYer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Was bought for a haunted trail in the woods, worked great. Easy to see out of. Only issue is that it gathered sticks, still having trouble getting getting em out.
customer_reviews.author: Acacia

customer_reviews.title: Great costume at Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great for our Trade Show costume! It was a military theme and these were a hit. Thank you! Price was also great. Shipping was fast. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Do not drop it, you'll never find it.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my Brother who is a hunter in the New England area. It fits well, true to sizes. Its "radar netting" on a zip jacket that very very breathable. Great for all seasons, as it can be layered.
customer_reviews.author: Wonky De Mateo

customer_reviews.title: It is super lightweight. I wore it over my regular clothing ...
customer_reviews.text: It is super lightweight. I wore it over my regular clothing when slipping to the woods for a quick hunt.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Rardin

customer_reviews.title: The price great and the quality for far is good
customer_reviews.text: The price great and the quality for far is good. I found the same set up at local stores for $99.00 and they are a little fuller with string. Not a lot of difference between the more expensive. I am 6' and 200lbs and it was a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Great suit for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed this suit. I was able to walk up 20ft. from a deer with it on. It is easy to put in my backpack and have as an extra layer whenever I want it.
customer_reviews.author: autry151

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Keep in rucksack for quick use when stalking.
customer_reviews.author: 11B40PX2S

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. I sat quiet and a turkey hen walked by at 15 feet away and never saw me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kasko

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for extended use
customer_reviews.text: Well worth what it cost. Very comfortable for extended use. Best full body camo I have ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: JRobin

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Thin, breathable great for bow hunting plus provide good mosquito protection.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: This was alot thinner than I was expecting, based ...
customer_reviews.text: This was alot thinner than I was expecting, based on the pictures. When you consider the price, its appropriate. The construction is essentially mesh with a camo pattern with other pieces of the same mesh with sightly frilly edges sewn onto the main garment about every 2 inches. Its effective, but just barely
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good pattern, poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: Zipper is poorly made and the elastic at the bottom of the coat is infuriating. I’m a 6’2, 220lbs Fireman and the pants are about 3” to short. Great Camo pattern but I’ve made some adjustments. Put it on when your ready do not hike in it and it’s best for spring turkey season.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cefalo

customer_reviews.title: Great gear. Fits well for warmer weather climate
customer_reviews.text: Great gear. Fits well for warmer weather climate. I would have to order a couple sizes larger if I needed to wear multiple under layers.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great price Best camouflage suite great for Halloween  and paint ball
customer_reviews.text: Great price Best camouflage suite great for Halloween and paint ball i'm 5'10 and fit perfect you can see on the photo really work as camouflage
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Ace

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I both bought this suit for deer hunting this year. I'm 5'3 and he's 5'6, it is a little long in length but they are fine if we hike them up on our waist. They fit great over our snow pants and jackets (which we hopefully won't have to wear this fall)!! Good quality, recommend buying these..exact same ones at gander mountain for $20 more. Happy Hunting!
customer_reviews.author: TaylorC

customer_reviews.title: God ghillie for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good ghillie suit for airsoft. Every thing fits nicely, except the jacket's elastic band at the bottom is a little tight. Good camo.
customer_reviews.author: Geri Hardee

customer_reviews.title: It fits!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'2 and 275, it fits fine. I'm very impressed for the price. Have not had it in the woods yet. No strong odors. I don't think you will go wrong buying this one
customer_reviews.author: SHoguet

customer_reviews.title: Quality suit for great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the top of this suit for about 4 weeks now during turkey season, and I have been very pleased. Good quality and camouflages well. Can't beat it for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Coop

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it! If he put it on ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! If he put it on I couldn't find him in the woods :) but do not expect to be able to put it back in the "packing sack"-that is impossible
customer_reviews.author: NotaChance

customer_reviews.title: Feels great fits good
customer_reviews.text: Fits pretty good if you have a big waist the largest size they sell might not fit you if you are Slim I am 6'1, 215 pounds and it fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Legacey

customer_reviews.title: Son loves this
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! He likes to jump out and scare people in it :) Came all in a small bag too.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaneedswinex3

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very well put together suit. Works amazing in hot or warm weather. The breathable fabric is just a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Very thin material, but that's what I was looking for hunting in the deep south. The pattern is good and your outline is broken up well. Also I'm 6'1" 225 lbs and muscular and it fits me. For the money this was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, difficult to get back into bag after use.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Meacham

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Now I can sit out in my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Now I can sit out in my yard and kill those pesky squirrel. I got to keep them of my peacan trees
customer_reviews.author: Black Beekeeper (BBK)

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything was fine. Suits sheds a little.ade my son the perfect Christmas tree for a party.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this to wear and his in the bushes and scare his friends. It’s awesome
customer_reviews.author: Jrocks

customer_reviews.title: Full suit with room for him to grow
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Christmas gift for my 11 year old, he loves hunting and really wanted a full suit. With the elastic band he will be able to grow with this one.
customer_reviews.author: rusticglamlife

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not the greatest quality but comfortable and lightweight. Worked well for turkey hunting this spring
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Osisek

customer_reviews.title: Quieter then alot of others
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife for Christmas and she loves it. Fits her good.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaHunter

customer_reviews.title: 5 star
customer_reviews.text: Use it Everytime I go hunting love it can have deer almost walk in you
customer_reviews.author: Mycheal

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as good quality as I thought it would be, but works great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Zipper on the jacket blew out the very first time I took it out. Is very light weight. Could definitely use a better quality zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Zane

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Works good even if you dont wear all at once
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camo net suit
customer_reviews.text: Quality is ok it's light weight and fits to sizebut may rip if u snag to hard on a limb..probly won't last but couldle years. But for the money not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Alan M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: As most say cheaply made but does do an excellent job of concealement!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Sczesny

customer_reviews.title: Too cool!
customer_reviews.text: I can be invisible in plain sight, what a great suit! Hide and seak and capture the flag will never be the same again. This is a great Halloween costume too. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Feedback

customer_reviews.title: Effective and on price point
customer_reviews.text: this is a two piece set and the top is euro zipper (left), spent three days elk hunting and very impressed. Quiet, Doesn't snag , strong fabric and a bit stretchy, very breathable in hot weather , elk didnt know what they are looking at . Wear this right over your everyday work wear and you are hidden in the forest .
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: The suit is very light weight which I like. It fits good on my 6'2 nephew who ...
customer_reviews.text: The suit is very light weight which I like.It fits good on my 6'2 nephew who I bought it for.He loves it but it is a little darker then I would like.overall very happy with it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: James & Maria Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Not for hunters!
customer_reviews.text: This thing stinks to high heaven. No matter how many washes or soaks in baking soda it won’t lose it’s smell. It’s also pretty sparse in areas
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Sever

customer_reviews.title: This is a good deal, looks good
customer_reviews.text: This is a good deal, looks good. I'm 5'10", 240 and it fit, but probably wouldn't if you wanted more than jeans and a light jacket underneath.
customer_reviews.author: RonMD

customer_reviews.title: I will recommend this product for anyone and special for kids so You don’t have bye new clothing
customer_reviews.text: I both the suit for my son. He used ones looks good to me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Haven't had a chance to use it for hunting turkey ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use it for hunting turkey season is just around the corner shipping was fast product was exactly what I expected I get four stars
customer_reviews.author: Richard W.

customer_reviews.title: Get this one
customer_reviews.text: Great suit and is super in expensive. Looks good and will work well for this turkey season. Came with somewhat of a scent and some threads here and there but overall I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bryson Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Snaps look a little weak. The rest of the suit is very workable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sort of works
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as described but will do. Can't fit much under suit.
customer_reviews.author: keng

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As expected and described. Seems to be a decent quality.

customer_reviews.title: bow ninja
customer_reviews.text: Really like this leafy suit. its quite and keeps the insects out on hotter days.

customer_reviews.title: Still good over all
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is a little small. Still good over all.

customer_reviews.title: Size runs small
customer_reviews.text: Size is misleading. It runs small. I had to return it

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm
customer_reviews.text: Not double stiched and falls apart easy. But for the money it's good

customer_reviews.title: Fit was good for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'6" 140 lbs and the fit was about perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Pegleg

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Very thin and under sized. I am a 2x and it was very small on me.
customer_reviews.author: Hector R.

product_meta.title: OUTERDO Camo Suits Ghillie Suits 3D Leaves Woodland Camouflage Clothing Army Sniper Military Clothes and Pants for Jungle Hunting, Shooting, Airsoft, Wildlife Photography, Halloween
feature_bullets: ★ELASTIC WAIST :Elastic waist on trousers for easy size adjustment - Poppers on jacket make it very easy to get on and off

★LIGHTWEIGHT AND BREATHABLE:OUTERDO camo suit is make out of breathable mesh polyester fabric and nylon rope,it can make the suit more comfortable and breathable.This feels smooth to the skin so you can wear a T-shirt underneath.

★DON'T CATCH ONTO BRANCHES OR TWIGS:This camo suit unlike traditional ghillie suits, the 3D leaves do not catch onto branches, pick up twigs and stickers. This camo suit stays relatively dirt free, keeping you light on your feet. This suit is great for heavily wooded areas, areas with thick and tall

★WIDE APPLICATION:It can be used in a variety of camouflage military equipment, such as tanks, artillery, armored vehicles, missiles, vehicles, missile launchers, airports, arsenal, individual equipment camouflage.It still can use for Hunting, Shooting, Wildfowling, Stalking, Paintball, Airsoft, Surveillance, Wildlife Photography, Birdwatching, Film Sets, Nightclubs, Kids Play Dens, Tree Houses,etc

★WHAT WE PROVIDE: Package includes 1 x trousers and 1 x jacket. If you have any questions about these products, please feel free to contact us, we will provide you with a satisfactory solution, you have no risk to try.
